quest.name: Sparring Lesson
journal:
Eshana wants your assistance in training a new recruit.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Spar with the Ananta recruit in the Striped Hills.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Have you a moment or two to ssspare, Forename? I have an overconfident recruit who could benefit from a sssparring sssession with one of your experience.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Captain Alpa is expending every effort to sssecure our position here on the bridge, and we cannot afford to have unreliable sssoldiers in our ranksss.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: You will find thisss recruit training with an inssstructor in the Striped Hills─open my sssister's eyes to her shortcomings, Forename.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER03053
dialogue.text: You... You're the eikon-ssslayer! What need do you have of one like me?

dialogue.name: ANANTAKLEADER03053
dialogue.text: You've come to train our ssstone-headed sssister? Good. She has talent for the ssspear and the blade, but has yet to learn the value of humility.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIER03053
dialogue.text: If you're ready to ssspar, then let usss be about it!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text:
But, I thought...
I need to catch my breath...

dialogue.name: ANANTAKLEADER03053
dialogue.text: You ssstrike with admirable force, but do not underessstimate your opponent.

dialogue.name: ANANTAKLEADER03053
dialogue.text: I appreciate the way you humbled her, ssstrider. Watching you fight was as much a joy for me as it was a lessson for her.

dialogue.name: ANANTAKLEADER03053
dialogue.text: And now that you have knocked her down, it will be my job to build her up again─thisss time with better habitsss I should hope. Eshana will be pleased.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Hah! You ssspared her no mercy, then! That is good. I only hope that the change to her perssspective lasssts longer than her bruises.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: And if it doesn't, well...I may sssend you for another sssparring match!

dialogue.name: ANANTAKLEADER03053
dialogue.text: Return to Eshana─I will follow up on the “educational” drubbing you gave my sssister.
